name: planted.schnitzel
description: Our signature breaded schnitzel with a golden, crispy exterior and tender interior.
longDescription: The planted.schnitzel Classic is comfort food at its finest. A crispy, golden exterior gives way to tender, flavorful plant-based goodness. Perfect for family dinners or whenever you're craving that satisfying schnitzel experience.
ingredients: Water, pea protein (20%), wheat flour, breadcrumbs, rapeseed oil, pea fiber, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Pan-fry in oil for 3-4 minutes on each side until golden brown. Also great in the oven at 200°C for 15-18 minutes.

steps.title: Heat
steps.description: Generous oil in pan. Or preheat oven to 200°C.

steps.title: Fry
steps.description: 3-4 minutes each side until golden and crispy.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Squeeze of lemon. Potato salad. Perfection.
